name: Sentinel-Net
description: Multi-Agent AI Consensus System with RWPV Protocol

phase1.name: Foundation
phase1.description: Project structure, data preprocessing, model training
features: Data preprocessing pipeline with TF-IDF vectorization
Feature engineering (char_count, word_count, url_count, special_char_ratio)
4 ML models trained: Naive Bayes (98.2%), Random Forest (96.4%), Logistic Regression (98.2%), SVM (untrained)

phase2.name: Consensus Engine
phase2.description: RWPV protocol, weighted voting, reputation system
features: RWPV (Reputation-Weighted Proposer-Voter) protocol implementation
Weighted majority voting with dynamic weights
4-phase consensus: vote collection, aggregation, decision, reputation update
Weight adjustment mechanism: ±5% correct/wrong, +15% minority correct

phase3.name: Backend API
phase3.description: FastAPI endpoints, Supabase database integration, text classification
features: FastAPI backend with lifespan context manager
5 core endpoints: /health, /classify/text, /classify/batch-text, /consensus/weights, /consensus/reputations
Supabase PostgreSQL integration for data persistence
Background tasks for async database logging
Full deliberation logs and vote history

phase4.name: Frontend UI
phase4.description: Next.js frontend with documentation and live predictor
features: Live text classifier component for SMS classification
Multi-tab documentation center for different stakeholders
Real-time metrics dashboard (pending final connection)
Responsive design with Tailwind CSS and shadcn/ui
Version tracking in UI

phase5.name: Testing & Validation
phase5.description: Comprehensive testing framework with real disagreement analysis
features: 3-layer testing framework: unit, adversarial, real disagreement
Byzantine fault tolerance validation
Real model disagreement analysis on production data
Complete audit trails for all predictions

phase6.name: Deployment (Pending)
plannedFeatures: Monitoring and alerting with Better Stack

features: Full audit trail of all predictions
Vote history for each agent
Weight evolution tracking
Real-time metrics snapshots

security.dataEncryption: HTTPS in transit, encrypted at rest
security.auditLog: Complete audit trail for all predictions

futureRoadmap: Version 2.1.0: Federated learning for distributed models

changes: ✓ Full test coverage with real disagreement validation
